mapper.select: SELECT e.memId, e.entdMainPic, e.entdURL, m.memNick FROM enterprise e INNER JOIN member m ON e.memId = m.memId;

SELECT b.boardId, b.boardTitle, b.boardViewCount, b.boardRegtime, b.boardUpdateTime, b.boardContents, b.memId, b.boardType, f.filePath FROM board b INNER JOIN file f ON b.boardId = f.boardId WHERE b.boardType = 'share' ORDER BY b.boardRegtime DESC;
